trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> control.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> is a version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> designed specifically for use in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> — Это версия <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> разработан специально для использования в <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The special features include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Специальные возможности включают <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A>, и <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> can contain text or an icon that reflects the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> могут содержать текст или значок, который отражает состояние приложения.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> class to find, add, or remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objects.
trans-unit.target: Используйте <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> класса для поиска, добавления или удаления <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> объектов.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Несмотря на то что <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> заменяет и расширяет его функциональные возможности <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> управления предыдущих версий, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> можно сохранить для обратной совместимости и использования в будущем, если выбрать.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> with various common properties set.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> различные общие свойства набора.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified image.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified text.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified image and text.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class with the specified name that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
Gets or sets a value that determines where the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> is aligned on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Одно из значений перечисления <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> property is affected by the setting of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Значение <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> свойство зависит от настройки <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода демонстрируется синтаксис для различных <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> общих свойств, включая <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates which sides of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> show borders.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Одно из значений перечисления <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides.None" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides.None" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода демонстрируется синтаксис для различных <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> общих свойств, включая <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Одно из значений перечисления <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle.Flat" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle.Flat" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода демонстрируется синтаксис для различных <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> общих свойств, включая <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: The value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" /> values.
Gets the default margin of an item.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the margin.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />, представляющий поле.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> can be fitted.
An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint" /> event.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> automatically fills the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> as the form is resized.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> automatically fills the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> as the form is resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Если <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> автоматически заполняет доступное пространство на <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> при изменении размеров; в противном случае — формы <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property to `true` to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to smoothly resize along with its container.
trans-unit.target: Задать <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> свойства `true` Включение <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> для согласованного изменения размеров вместе с его контейнера.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода демонстрируется синтаксис для различных <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> общих свойств, включая <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> свойство.
